name: Piou-chan
description:
Piou-chan wakes up one day and his friend tells him that all the colours of the world got stolen. Now Piuo-chan needs to get all the colours of his friends back. Piou-chan needs to walk, jump and walljump through the forest, where the slimes live, to get the colours back. He needs to plan where he walks, cause every slime leaves toxic slime that isn't very good to touch. 

What do you get in this game: 
  • 7 Level + Tutorial
  • Jumps/ Walljumps 
  • Slime 
  • Calm gameplay with nearly no threats 
  • Calm music
  • More slime 
  • Well crafted environment 
  • 3 Types of regions (Forest with the Slime Village, Mushroom Forest, Cristal Cave)
  • Even more slime 
  • Eastereggs
  • Collactables
  • Handmade animations and sprites
  • controller support
